website_summaries.verdict: These adorable reusable gift bags earn first place for their sturdy construction, adorable aesthetics, and keen attention to detail. Beautifully designed and built to last.
pros: Handmade cotton construction is sturdy and reliable
Classic prints and colors are eye-catching, yet elegant
Built-in cinch tie ribbons and complimentary name tags are a nice touch
Set offers both large and small bags
Available in varying sizes and colors
cons: We'd love to see a wider selection of colors and prints

customer_reviews.title: Simple, lovely, generic,
customer_reviews.text: Fast and easy. Many sizes to fit everything I needed for Christmas. I want MORE!! I want MORE COLORS and TEXTURES. I want velvet and more sparkles. I want SILVER! I bought another brand along with these so I would have more variety. The competitor was not nearly as nice and was more expensive and more complex with cardboard supports, and bows. Not nearly as great as yours. Make MORE!! I don't want the black. I don't want the maroon (too much like RED) MORE MORE MORE! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Julie L Myhreschnell

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bags for any occassion
customer_reviews.text: I got these for Christmas as this year I said I was not wrapping anything so I didn't have to throw away paper. So I purchased these bags for my smaller gifts. They are exactly as described and touch notch quality. I wish they had them in more color options but I would definitely say these are better quality than I expected and everyone that received a gift in them loved that the bag was also a gift. So many uses for them and they are very sturdy. I would recommend them to anyone. Thanks for having them to buy please add more colors.
customer_reviews.author: Beach

customer_reviews.title: Almost as popular as the gifts
customer_reviews.text: These were a HUGE hit this Christmas, everyone was delighted by how handy and easy these were for wrapping presents. It didn't contribute to a huge pile of wrapping paper, lots of friends and family used them to haul their presents home in, and people just enjoyed suddenly having a useful, reusable bag. I will be buying more, and would love to see more patterns!
customer_reviews.author: Rye Bread

customer_reviews.title: Perfect way to wrap presents without waste!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for some cute bags for wrapping Christmas presents and this is exactly what I was looking for. These are great quality and durable, and look cute too! I’d love it if you made more non-Christmas colors - maybe blue, green... I’m definitely buying more, as I can tell these will last for years, and people love receiving them!
customer_reviews.author: txteacher

customer_reviews.title: Goodbye messy gift wrapper!!
customer_reviews.text: I would highly recommend this gift pouch, you save time , eventually money and your gift looks very expensive with this.. I got this last Christmas and I'm going to use this again next Christmas, i don't have to use scissors, tapes, boxes and gift wrappers .. after the kids open the gifts, fold it and put it away .. I have the gold and the red one.. highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: angel1

customer_reviews.title: Love these bags!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these bags. I had no problem with sticking or smell. I used one for my Pollyanna party and it was the first gift chosen from the pile -- the person said they picked because of the bag! I got regular size and I put wine, coffee and chocolate in it! Bow is like a cinch and tops the package off. Can't get any easier. My only wish is they were a few dollars cheaper. I would buy for every gift under the treee! Love the quality and would re - buy
customer_reviews.author: stephanie ortel

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and useful, but a bit difficult to cinch up
customer_reviews.text: Excellent concept, and the sparkly bags look great under the Christmas tree. The fabric is not flimsy, so it seems like it will hold up for many uses. But, the drawstring is hard to push into the casing, and could easily tear, so you have to be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t hold up to one wash
customer_reviews.text: These are a very poor quality option. I wanted ones that could work for Holiday and Birthdays so I went with the black and white ones. On the first wash (which was cold and a very short cycle) they came back out looking like a pen exploded on them. Not only are there black marks on the white sections but the black sections look crazy faded. In addition the black ribbons look atrocious. No instructions on how to wash these came with them so I don’t know if I did something wrong but this makes me really bummed. I would really love to get my money back since these came out so bad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought these bags but was disappointed. One bag did not come with a ribbon to close it and another bag had a sloppy paint job with obvious splotches on the bag. So I am sorry I waisted money on them. If the bags were as in the photos I would have loved them but I got some poor quality bags.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Kellagher

customer_reviews.title: Great, sturdy cotton bags with stunning paint patterns.
customer_reviews.text: These bags are really great. Their sizes won't work for everything. But they look fantastic. The paint on them is saturated, but well defined. When first unfolding, they were a bit stuck together, but I examined them carefully & there was no transfer or loss of the paint. The next larger size (wine bottle & moderate men's shoe box) would be nice. I'm going to use them as Easter Baskets. It happens every year now that I can't find the Easter Baskets of the year before, or I'm one short. So these will be a nice size. And they will look stunning. Thank you for making them!
customer_reviews.author: TCW

customer_reviews.title: Zero wrapping paper for the win!
customer_reviews.text: I hate wrapping gifts and the trash it produces, so these were an absolute perfect purchase for me this holiday season. I wish the white areas were just a tad bit more opaque, but it doesn't bother me much and it's also not super easy to tell what the gift is. I plan on using these for birthdays, mother/father days, etc!
customer_reviews.author: Janine Patrice

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: These bags are beautiful and well-made, and the owners are awesome! Love the combination of patterns and look forward to more colors. I ordered three sets--red, black, and blue. The blue set arrived loose in the box, without packaging, and one of the bags was missing. Although it was likely an Amazon error during fulfillment, the owners volunteered to replace the set without cost. When the box arrived, I was floored--they had also included the gold set. Best Customer Service ever!! Order from this company, you won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Adorkable

customer_reviews.title: These are a great size for inside the Big Santa Bags! Recycle year to year!
customer_reviews.text: Love to use year to year-recycle-reuse-perfect. Just put gifts inside another less expensive reusable bag so family/friends can unwrap knowing that nothing is going to the local dump. KEEP THE EARTH CLEAN-WE DON”T HAVE A SECOND ONE!
customer_reviews.author: Joni

customer_reviews.title: They are cute and well made.
customer_reviews.text: These are very cute but a little on the pricey side for what I’m using them for and how many I need. I’d love to get in touch with the shop owners and work something out in order to make them work for my purpose!
customer_reviews.author: Cory E.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect big sacks
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for each child and grandchild to pack all their opened gifts in at Christmas to take home. We always have trouble packing everyone’s stuff up in a box and keeping stuff together for the trip home from my house. Everything for everybody fit perfectly in their bag. One person couldn’t make to open gifts so we packed all of his wrapped gifts in one to take to him and that fit perfectly also. Great bags for my idea!
customer_reviews.author: Judy S

customer_reviews.title: These were fantastic for getting gifts thru TSA but largest bag is not for larger items
customer_reviews.text: I will buy again but will have to buy another same product for larger gifts. Needs to have one big bag in the set rather then multiple smaller ones. But I have had carefully wrapped packages torn open by airline TSA and these are a god = send
customer_reviews.author: Customer since 1918

customer_reviews.title: Finally arrived
customer_reviews.text: Ok finally received my bags and I love them. I’m giving only 3 stars because it was a one day shipping item, and 5 days later they arrived. Very nice quality and bright colors. Love the soft fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Read size description before purchase!
customer_reviews.text: The only downside is that the bags are smaller than expected. That is my fault since I did not read the description and size of the product. Read the decription if you are planning on buying! Even though I did not read the size description, these will still work great for Christmas!! I'm extremely pleased with my purchase and it was absolutely worth the price! Thanks Appleby lane for the awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: Midori Guy

customer_reviews.title: I’m obsessed with these bags
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these bags! They’re perfect in every way. I like the thickness and stiffness of the fabric—it makes it more secure when tied, I think. I bought six or seven sets of these, no joke, I’m done wasting paper every Christmas!!
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Cat sized
customer_reviews.text: My 14lb cat fit perfect in the larger bags. Super easy to get both cats into, mostly because they like being in bags anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: I am 5 star happy !
customer_reviews.text: These bags are very well made and quite pretty. Arrived very quickly. Great alternative to wasteful wrapping paper. The design is suitable for almost any occasion and especially for the holidays ! Once I opened my first package and saw the quality I immediately ordered 2 more sets.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Bags are very attractive and good quality
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for cute bags to put several different items in as gifts for my daughter. When I saw these I immediately thought they were perfect! The sizes were ample for the items I was gifting. I liked that each bag had a different design in black and white. I used 4 of the 5 bags and presented them in a wicker basket, adding the tags which large enough to put some handwritten loving messages from mother to daughter! She loved this!!
customer_reviews.author: janet mann

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: These bags were the best ones I have purchased. Look fantastic. The material is cloth and heavy cloth at that. Great sizes. I will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Dollybell

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but what you expect is what you get
customer_reviews.text: These are a bit over priced imho, but they look great and do the job. The drawstring is a bit wonky, but again, it works and the final gift presentation is very attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Jackalopekat

customer_reviews.title: Love these bags!
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags. In an effort to become more eco-friendly especially during the holiday season, these bags were just what I was looking for. I love out sturdy they are and they close right up nicely. My only complaint is I wish there were other patterns and colors for Christmas. Other than that, I will probably be purchasing more for next year!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Newman

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for those se who are disabled do not have time to wrap are do not write attractive!
customer_reviews.text: I love my gift t bags. This is wonderful idea. They are so decorative. I will be proud to give m gifts since they will be in your gift bags. Excell
customer_reviews.author: Helen Justus

customer_reviews.title: Cute bags that are perfect when mailing gifts!
customer_reviews.text: I loved these bags. I needed them to mail gifts to my granddaughter overseas. They arrived as fresh as when I packed them. The complimentary designs with matching colors made the several gifts more cohesive. I’m sure she will recycle them.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Loved at first
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these, so pretty and such a nice change of pace, reusable will never use paper again.
customer_reviews.author: K9saver

customer_reviews.title: Great for gifts!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to wrap odd shaped Christmas presents. I loved them. The quality was great and I received exactly what I expected. I made sure to read what sizes I would be receiving in the description. Friends and family who received gifts in the bags also loved them! I will be ordering more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Bri

customer_reviews.title: Items were stained and dirty inside sealed package
customer_reviews.text: Horribly disappointed. Package arrived safely but the bags inside the sealed package were stained and dirty.
customer_reviews.author: holly

customer_reviews.title: Wrapping just got easier
customer_reviews.text: Just put the gift in and tie, reuse again and again. No tissue, nothing. Best idea for gift wrapping ever!
customer_reviews.author: HappyDays

customer_reviews.title: Buffalo plaid gift bags
customer_reviews.text: I loved these bags. Everyone liked receiving their gift in one. Lots of compliments. Matched my Christmas decor perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Dent

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Used these for Christmas gifts and they were perfect! Hope to buy more before next year!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Not quite as expected.
customer_reviews.text: They are very basic. The fabric is synthetic and they aren’t especially attractive or study which was disappointing since my objective was to create LESS waste by using gift bags rather that paper, tape, and ribbons destined for the rubbish. They were also wrapped in plastic. If your plan is to create less waste this isn’t the product for you.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Cute fabric gift bags!
customer_reviews.text: Darling fabric gift bags! So cute. Great for gifts or for display in your home!
customer_reviews.author: Joan Carver

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I love them. They worked great. I just wish one had been a little bigger.
customer_reviews.author: D. Champlain

customer_reviews.title: Good quality..,good value!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product, well made. I am looking forward to many years of use from these bags. Gone is the wrapping paper, tape and ribbon!
customer_reviews.author: California Connie

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to love these.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a better option than wasteful wrapping paper or bags. But these just aren’t great.
customer_reviews.author: yara ibarra

customer_reviews.title: Wrap bags looked great under tree!
customer_reviews.text: Used these for Christmas wraps We will save them for next year which is the point! Nice designs Would like some traditional Christmas ones!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah W.

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but not sure I'll purchase more.
customer_reviews.text: They're decent little bags however I wish they were larger. I was expecting a little more thickness to them.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a gift bag
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought these to put gifts in and they were perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Great for gift giving on the go
customer_reviews.text: These cloth bags made gift wrapping so easy and could be packed in our luggage flat and lightweight. They are good quality and opaque. I'll be buying more!
customer_reviews.author: DeeDeePgh

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I have two kittens and I’m risking enough by putting up a tree. I could not imagine rewrapping gifts after they shredded holiday paper. Plus the environmental impact of the paper. These look great and took a fraction of the usual time to get the gifts under the tree.
customer_reviews.author: sue seden

customer_reviews.title: Nice bags
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bags. I just wish there was an option to get all big bags and more than 5 at a time
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: Love these bags!
customer_reviews.text: Great fabrics for any occasion and truly reusable. They last and last, all while looking great. One of my new favorite things!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous, eco-friendly
customer_reviews.text: These were my best holiday find in 2017! I am searching for additional color patterns to use throughout the year but have not had luck. Durable, reusable, and ship in small packaging; these bags are extremely eco-friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Stockton

customer_reviews.title: Bags received were different than pictured
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed that the sacks I received were not the same as in the picture. I am hesitant to even say they were similar. No where in the ad did it say that the items may vary from the picture.
customer_reviews.author: BNF

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for gifting!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for holiday gifting - looked as pictured, well made, and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: BaldwinSmithie

customer_reviews.text: Convenient and practical, however photos are somewhat misleading. Would have liked the bags to be larger than indicated.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Unique!
customer_reviews.text: These beautiful bags were a simple way to make my gift giving unique and special. They are so cute and durable!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Riker

customer_reviews.title: eco-christmas
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for an eco-friendly Christmas! I'll be reusing these bags for years
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the colors and the sizes
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for those who don’t want to spend time wrapping gifts. I like the size as well. I will be using them instead of stockings.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Dillon

customer_reviews.title: love them
customer_reviews.text: So cute and great for sending gifts in the mail. I have ordered more for the holidays!
customer_reviews.author: Ann Marie

customer_reviews.title: They are Fab!
customer_reviews.text: I had to write this review I ordered yesterday to use bags this year versus all the paper we use adn Oh MY! THEY ARRIVED AND THEY ARE JUST WONDERFUL AND CAN BE REUSED! So if your looking for something special and practical this is it! Thank you,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was a great buy for me
customer_reviews.text: The bags were of a better quality material than I thought. I ordered enough for Christmas and liked them so well that I ordered a set for other occasions. I should have enough to last the entire year and beyond.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly B.

customer_reviews.title: CUTE BAGS
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty bags. They looked great under the Christmas tree. People were excited to receive a gift in one of these bags. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: JULIE O'LEARY

customer_reviews.title: Delightful little packages
customer_reviews.text: My niece was so surprised when I handed her a bag instead of something gift wrapped she loved it. She kept the bag. Ha
customer_reviews.author: Cheri mittermaier

customer_reviews.title: worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I love everything I bought this year for gifts, but these bags are my best find! In the future I will just budget the bags into the gift price, they are worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Ann

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than expected. Strong and made very well. Looked pretty sitting under the tree.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Renfrat

customer_reviews.title: You don’t get the patterns shown
customer_reviews.text: The bags are very cute and nice. I liked the combination of prints shown, I didn’t get either of those. It was hard to find the large size, so I will still use.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Payne

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift Bags, Printed Design May Vary.
customer_reviews.text: I am really pleased with the quality and sturdiness of these bags. The gold decoration and ribbon is shiny and beautiful. I did receive one bag in a different print than the one pictured, but I’m content with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: AD

customer_reviews.title: Nice alternative to wrapping paper.
customer_reviews.text: These gave my gifts a fun, unified look with minimal effort and sustainability as an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: weird feel to the fabric
customer_reviews.text: I did not feel the construction of the seams were good enought especially if you needed to wash them. The patterns were cute tho
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: These are great quality bags which should hold up for years. I love the shiny fabric because it makes them more like wrapping paper without the waste. Thanks for making a great product!
customer_reviews.author: EZM

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute!
customer_reviews.text: I love the bags! They add an extra touch to gift wrapping. I added some decoration to the tags to make them more personal as well.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Davis

customer_reviews.title: Didn't get what the web site said.
customer_reviews.text: Bags looked ok but the item said I would get 5 bags and only got 3
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Saves time and environment!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to reduce waste and found something that also saves so much time! My packages look amazing and took seconds to "wrap"! I need many more of these!
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic gift bags!
customer_reviews.text: Love these bags! They take HTV well, the tags work great with the writing function on a cricut, and they’re so cute! Will definitely order more!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Classy and durable
customer_reviews.text: These are so classy! Perfect for reusing for Christmas presents.
customer_reviews.author: EmmyJo

customer_reviews.title: Great for Xmas Gifts
customer_reviews.text: We use these bags year after year to reduce gift wrap. They’re sturdy and sparkly and have held up Year after year.
customer_reviews.author: Jbel99

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gift bags
customer_reviews.text: I really liked for gift wrapping and the look under the tree. Plan to order more for gift giving.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Christmas gift bags
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Christmas gift bags. Was able to put gifts in each, depending on size, and everyone asked me where I got them. Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Carmela Ventura

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift Bags
customer_reviews.text: There are great bags to reuse year after year and avoid all that wrapping paper in the trash every holiday season. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Leigh Constant

customer_reviews.title: Top quality
customer_reviews.text: I love your gift bags. Not only are they beautiful but they will be reused for many occasions. They are a gift with a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Aussie C

customer_reviews.title: Not attractive
customer_reviews.text: Looked very cheap. Fabric felt rough and red was more “tomato red”, less “Christmas red”.
customer_reviews.author: Allison O.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift bags.
customer_reviews.text: The bags are very durable. I love that they can be reused. Also, the bigger bags are great for those unusual size gifts.
customer_reviews.author: C Tillman

customer_reviews.title: Do your part to live a more sustainable lifestyle
customer_reviews.text: Moving away from wrapping paper to something more sustainable. I plan to use them year after year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Splurge....Bags Not Worth It
customer_reviews.text: Would not buy again. One bag had defective stitching and for the money I expected a lot better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful reusable bags
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags. Just wish they were a little less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: AKB

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love these bags! Perfect for gifts, much better than paper. And your gift recipient can resuse it as well!
customer_reviews.author: William J. Boylan

customer_reviews.title: Loved these! Christmas stockings are my daughters favorite thing
customer_reviews.text: Loved these! Christmas stockings are my daughters favorite thing. This year I knew the gifts wouldn’t fit into a regular stocking, so I got these, my daughters loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Craddock

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Doing my small part to save the planet. Love these !!!

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: They were supposed to be xxl bags and they were tiny.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Great packaging with useful tags and drawstring on the bag. Couldn't be happier! Great product.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for holidays
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for easy holiday gift wrapping and they looked beautiful under the tree!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Gift box alternative
customer_reviews.text: Used for gifts to mail to our daughter instead of putting them into gift boxes.

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Color is not red. It is brownish red. Ribbon is wrinkled and thin . Will not be using.
customer_reviews.author: Constance Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift bags.
customer_reviews.text: These bags were perfect for our extended family gift bags. You'll be glad you have these bags to easily wrap up your gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Used them for Christmas gifts and received several compliments on ...
customer_reviews.text: Used them for Christmas gifts and received several compliments on how they look. Next season I plan to build my supply.
customer_reviews.author: Graham Oberly

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Bags
customer_reviews.text: LOVED these gorgeous fabric bags, a huge hit for Christmas❣️🌟
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Adorable & durable!
customer_reviews.text: These bags are adorable and will last year after year.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Jeffries

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very well made with sturdy fabric and nice tie ribbons at the top.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Came Stuck Together
customer_reviews.text: I love all of tge bags but I am only giving a 4 star rating because when I got them in the mail they were stuck together and I had to carefully pull them apart so I wouldn't rip them
customer_reviews.author: Ankh Love

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size
customer_reviews.text: Thought these was large enough to use for gift baskets but I was so wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Chandra Acklin

customer_reviews.title: Practical and Well Made
customer_reviews.text: These were purchased for groups of prizes given at our Spa Weekend. They are perfect for this, or any other items that need a container. First, I wish I had bought three sets of these. They are great to have around the house, use in an emergency, and CAN be REUSED! They are so simple to work with that I'll be looking for more in different colors and sizes. They are a delight to pull from your wrapping box and re-use. An idea whose time has come! Be sure to get three packs. You never know when you'll need them!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Terrific, great looking time saver!
customer_reviews.text: Have purchased these numerous times. (Helpful hint: always try to buy off-season for best size & color selection). For someone like me, a last minute wrapper, who hates cutting, taping, finding just the right ribbon, etc., these are a godsend! Take some pretty tissue, dump in gift and voila! Various sizes. Gift 🏷 tag attached if you’ve forgotten a card. Plus, bag is nice enough so that even if gift itself is meh recipient is left with attractive, useful bag! I’ve had zero complaints but lots of requests for bags!
customer_reviews.author: JST

customer_reviews.title: These are Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: We used almost all reusable wrapping for Christmas last year, and it was wonderful not to have to watch all of that trash go into the landfill! These are beautiful, well made, and easy to use. They'll save you money on gift wrap, and clean up after opening gifts is much easier. I bought more this month (July) so that I wouldn't have to worry about them being sold out @ Christmas time. I'll never go back to wrapping paper again!
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Best Gift Bags and Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: Best gift bags around. I love the vibrant colors. These bags are thick and sturdy. I was thinking about making my own and I am so glad I didn't. These are much better quality that I could've made. Their customer service is hands down the best I've ever encountered. They are amazing. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Firedup4Jesus

customer_reviews.title: The Gold flakes off
customer_reviews.text: I love the concept of these bags, but I wish I hadn't gotten the gold. I wrapped my gifts on my bed, and now I have gold dust all over my comforter. I question how long these will last, and I wouldn't trust throwing the gold bags into the washing machine. They do seem a bit pricey for the quality, but they're reusable and save me a ton of hassle since I always have to travel via plane with Christmas gifts, and normal gift wrap would get completely torn up in my situation. Next year I might try the red.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Schimmoeller

customer_reviews.title: and these are the perfect option for not using paper or reusing bags (that ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cute bags. I am trying to be more environmental, and these are the perfect option for not using paper or reusing bags (that can look worn out after a couple of uses. They store flat, or you can fold them up to place in your storage container to be reused next year.
customer_reviews.author: LindaR

product_meta.title: Appleby Lane Reusable Fabric Gift Bags (Standard Set, Gold) Set of 5 Bags, Three 12x16 inch and Two 8x10 in Bags
product_meta.description: Color:Gold| Size:Standard SetSimplify your gift giving with these beautiful fabric gift bags. Put your present in the bag, tie the ribbon closed, and your wrapping is done! Each hand-screenprinted bag has a built-in cinch-tie ribbon to complete the wrapping without the need of wrapping paper, scissors, or tape. These eco-friendly gift bags can be reused time and again. 12x16 bags can hold a football, tablet, small laptop, clothing. books, etc. 8x10 bags can hold small electronics, candles, jewelry, accessories, etc. When estimating if an item will fit in the bag, please allow some room for the width of gift as well as room to cinch the bag closed. Cute fabric ribbon ties included and threaded into the casing, allowing for repeated use without getting lost. Simply cinch the bag closed and tie into a bow. No tape, no scissors required--wrap your gifts in seconds.
feature_bullets: Simple enough for even the most reluctant gift-wrapper
Built-in ribbon casing ruffle at the top, easy to tie.
Eco-friendly, handmade, high quality, durable, elegant
Eliminate the giant trash problem Christmas morning
New for 2016 -- Set of 5 bags, three 12x16 and two 8x10
